meanings.definition: A person or group that opposes or fights against terrorism.
meanings.sent1: The antiterrorists worked together to keep their country safe from harm.
meanings.sent2: The government deployed antiterrorists to prevent any attacks on the city.
meanings.sent3: The antiterrorists organized a charity event to raise funds for their cause.
meanings.sent4: In the game, the player takes on the role of an antiterrorist battling evil forces.
meanings.sent5: The bravery of the antiterrorists inspired others to join their noble mission.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of those who oppose or fight against terrorism.
meanings.sent1: The antiterrorists measures were put in place to ensure public safety.
meanings.sent2: The antiterrorists training program prepared individuals for challenging situations.
meanings.sent3: The antiterrorists rally brought the community together in a show of unity.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to be an antiterrorist advocate never wavered.
meanings.sent5: The antiterrorists efforts were recognized and appreciated by the citizens.
